reviewText: He does a great job and manages to keep you interested even though he performs alone. At times he sounds like he is playing with another guitarist. He is really gifted and a pleasant performer-really masters his guitar well!!

reviewText: Tommy Emmanuel is a brilliant guitarist.  Chet Atkins once remarked that Tommy is the greatest guitar player.If you are an acoustic guitar enthusiast you will enjoy this recording immensely.
summary: A very entertaining recording by a brilliant artist.

reviewText: Tommy is very good at what he does, could have used a little more vesitility in the type of songs he played and one session went a little long for my taste, but over all enjoyed his performance.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I just discovered Tommy Emmanuel (Tony Enamel as he says people mistakenly call him) on YouTube. I had no idea this guy had been around so long. Man was I missing out!I've played guitar for a long time and have a strong appreciation for real musical talent and ability developed and executed on it. This fella delivers nothing but that! He and his music are both amazing. And what makes it all the more enjoyable to watch is how much fun he has doing it. He really loves playing, is full of energy and seems like a wonderful guy. Still, if you have no concern for that part of the picture, Tommy's music and playing skills are a wonder to hear and see. He makes it look so easy you sometimes think you should be able to do what he's doing. So you pick up your guitar and... land right back in the real world again.Anyway, the DVD picture and sound quality is great! 5.1 surround sound with a crisp, clear digital image. I hope they make more of these with Tommy before he retires (which hopefully won't be for many years!!).God bless you Tommy. You've blessed us with the miracle of your music and personality. I wish you the absolute best.
summary: A new fan says- this will rock your socks off!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I saw Tommy Emmanuel for the first time on a Marty Stuart show.  He was fantastic so I wanted to get one of his videos.  This video was a dissapointment.  He has someone else playing along with him on the harmonica for most songs and that was a big distraction from Tommy's guitar playing.  I get more enjoyment watching clips on YouTube than from this video.  Also, I was looking forward to hearing him play Amazing Grace as he does on YouTube.  Again, a huge disappointment!  I do not recommend wasting your money on this DVD.  Just watch him on YouTube instead.
summary: This Video was a Huge Dissapointment
Title: N/A

reviewText: I DON'T CARE WHO YOU ARE..AN ACCOMPLISHED MUSICIAN OR JUST A CASUAL LISTENER YOU WILL BE COMPLETELY MESMERIZED BY THIS ARTIST.  HE IS NOT ONLY TECHNICALLY AN OUTSTANDING GUITARIST...HE'S AN ENTERTAINER TOO.  FASCINATING FOR THE LISTENER AND THE CRITICAL 'MUSICIANS' AUDIENCE.  ANYONE CAN ENJOY THIS DVD.//JM
summary: DOWN UNDER GUITAR MAN IS ON TOP OF HIS GAME

reviewText: What an amazing talent!  This recording is one of my favorites, and I've watched it several times.  Tommy is just a remarkable, exuberant musician - a joy to listen to, and more, to watch.  Highly recommend this presentation!
summary: The Most Amazing Guitarist I've Ever Heard
